text: Jinan Olympic Sports Centre Gymnasium is an indoor sporting arena located in Jinan, China. The capacity of the arena is 12,000 spectators. It hosts indoor sporting events such as basketball , gymnastics, badminton and volleyball, and also hosted the indoor events of the 2009 National Games of the People's Republic of China. ==References== ==External links== *Official website *Arena information Category:Indoor arenas in China Category:Sports venues in Shandong
title: Jinan Olympic Sports Center Gymnasium
